On 11 December 2018, IOHK hosted a public day of presentations about Plutus and Marlowe, functional programming languages for smart contracts on Cardano. At the event, Charles Hoskinson, CEO of IOHK, delivered the keynote speech. Watch it here:  https://t.co/U85N51Yr9a #PlutusFest

Check out the latest IOHK blog post about #PlutusFest:  https://t.co/1GE45yFajG PlutusFest was a successful event that introduced IOHK’s new smart contract languages tools for developers and financiers.

#EOS reached $2.52 climbing to number four by market capitalization after growing by 29.21% in the past 24 hours.  Top 5 right now are excellent projects – Including EOS. We’re glad #BCH left the group – it did not belong here.  #ADA #Cardano #XRP #BTC
